org.jclouds.abiquo.features
Interface CloudAsyncApi

public interface CloudAsyncApi

Provides asynchronous access to Abiquo Cloud API.

Author:
Ignasi Barrera, Francesc Montserrat
See Also:
http://community.abiquo.com/display/ABI20/API+Reference, CloudApi
